1107290.name: My Friend Pedro Soundtrack
1107290.description:
The My Friend Pedro Soundtrack is a collection of 42 different tracks from 5 incredible artists, with a playtime of over two hours.
All Tracks Are Presented In MP3 and WAV Format.

Songs will be placed in your My Friend Pedro folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\My Friend Pedro\Soundtrack

Track list:

1. Navie D - Requium for Rose
2. Navie D - Junkyard King
3. Nounverber - V A P E
4. Navie D - Slinky

6. Noisecream – Discrete
7. Navie D – Scatterbrain
